properties.value: Khali brew is a quest item in the Fight Arena quest. Khali brew is a quest item in the Fight Arena quest. Once the player has spoken to the Khazard Guard in the south-eastern room of the jail, it is possible to buy the beer for 5 coins from the Khazard barman in the bar in the south-west corner of the Fight Arena. The Khazard barman suggests lying down before drinking it so there is less distance to collapse, however there is no option for the player to drink it. Give it to the Khazard guard to get him drunk and steal the Khazard cell keys.

[[File:Khali brew detail.png|left|130x200px]]
'''Khali brew''' is a [[quest item]] in the [[Fight Arena]] [[quest]]. Once the player has spoken to the [[Khazard Guard (Gerald)|Khazard Guard]] in the south-eastern room of the jail, it is possible to buy the beer for {{NoCoins|5}} coins from the [[Khazard barman]] in the bar in the south-west corner of the [[Fight Arena (location)|Fight Arena]]. The Khazard barman suggests ''lying down before drinking it so there is less distance to collapse'', however there is no option for the player to drink it. Give it to the Khazard guard to get him drunk and steal the [[Khazard cell keys]].
